verbs.description: [ARG1: The 2016 presidential election] [V: was] [ARG2: so toxic that Americans spent nearly 74 million fewer hours with family and friends on Thanksgiving Day] , new research suggests . More than 48 million hours were lost when Thanksgiving guests from precincts that voted for Republican Donald Trump cut short their visits to hosts in precincts that went for Democrat Hillary Clinton . Another 35 million hours were ...
